#summary Implementations of the URI Template specification

= RFC6570 Implementations =

Implementations of the URI Template specification, [http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6570 RFC6570], along with the level of the spec they claim. 

*Implementers note*: a [https://github.com/uri-templates/uritemplate-test common test suite] is being collected.

  * C# - [https://github.com/tavis-software/UriTemplates UriTemplates] (level 4)
  * Java - [https://github.com/damnhandy/Handy-URI-Templates Handy-URI-Templates] (level 4)
  * Javascript - [https://github.com/fxa/uritemplate-js uritemplate-js] (level 4)
  * Perl - [http://search.cpan.org/dist/URI-Template/ URI::Template] (level 4)
  * PHP - [https://github.com/guzzle/guzzle Guzzle] (level 4)
  * PHP - [https://github.com/ioseb/uri-template C extension] (level 4)
  * Python - [https://github.com/uri-templates/uritemplate-py uritemplate-py] (level 4)
  * Ruby - [http://addressable.rubyforge.org/ addressable] (level 4)
  * Scala - [https://github.com/arktekk/uri-template uri-template] (level 4)
  * Eiffel - [https://github.com/EiffelWebFramework/EWF/tree/master/library/text/parser/uri_templateEiffelWebFramework] (?)
  * Go - [https://github.com/jtacoma/uritemplates uritemplates] (level 4)
  * Clojure - [https://github.com/mwkuster/uritemplate-clj uritemplates-clj] (level 4)
  * Java [https://github.com/fge/uri-template uri-template] (level 4)
  * Objective-C [https://github.com/cogenta/CSURITemplate CSURITemplate] (level 4)
  * PHP [https://github.com/Seebz/uri-template uri-template] (level 4)
  * Dart [https://github.com/google/uri.dart uri.dart] (level 4)
  * Scala [https://github.com/timt/uri-template uri-template] (level 4)
  * Javascript [https://github.com/geraintluff/uri-templates uri-templates] (level 4)
  * C# [https://github.com/a7b0/uri-templates Resta.UriTemplates] (level 4)
